sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PLACERREVIEW(FID, TITLE, CONTENT, SITEURL, FILEPATH) VALUES (#fid#, #title#, #content#, #siteURL#, #filePath#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PLACERREVIEW SET TITLE = #title#, CONTENT = #content#, SITEURL = #siteURL#, FILEPATH = #filePath# WHERE RID = #rid#
